amendment.description: Amendment strikes language in the bill dealing with health effect studies on drinking water contaminants; section 408 dealing with contracts; and section 409 dealing with American made goods and services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike 3 legislative provisions in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walsh amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Walsh.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walsh amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
